item.title: 2 - Importance of Value Types
item.description: Setup Windows 10 x64 FCEUX 2.2.3 Ninja Gaiden 2 for NES Cheat Engine 6.8.1 Prerequisite Knowledge of scanning simple values. See: Intro Scan Types The Value Type Before, I only paid attention to the Scan Type, where I said it’s always best to leave it at Unknown initial value. No need to know anything about assembly or how bytes are stored. The next step is Value Type, which is important and needs some explanation.
